bibl.title: Alexander, genie of genocide? [Alexandre, génie ou génocide?]
bibl.note: For centuries Alexander the Great has been a symbol of a successful king and conqueror. The reality was perhaps more grim and his success less complete than historians often imagined.
bibl.seg: Willy Clarysse, Alexander, genie of genocide? [Alexandre, génie ou génocide?]
For centuries Alexander the Great has been a symbol of a successful king and conqueror. The reality was perhaps more grim and his success less complete than historians often imagined.
